game.name: Ado Stunt Cars 2
game.description:
Racing games are very helpful when it comes to keeping boys entertained for hours especially in the case if they are the speed lovers. We have today got you covered with a brand new racing game where you have to drive your car through the circle-shaped ramps to win the competition. Join Ado Stunt Cars 2 and be prepared to perform plenty of cool stunts on multiple unique maps! There are different car models to play with and each car model looks attractive.

It is not going to be easy at all since you have to handle these new car models on deadly ramps and loops. Select any out of 19 exclusively-designed car models and get ready to perform death-defying stunts on various different maps! This html5 car driving game features 3 unique and challenging maps to race around. Take your seat on your chosen car and let the world show you can perform tricks out of this world! Put your driving and stunt-performing abilities to the test to complete all challenges!

Make sure to drive your vehicle through the tricky ramps and rotate your car at a 360 degree. Do not think twice while jumping from the dangerous ramps to a safe place. There is no time limit or mission to be accomplished so grab your seat in your favorite car and get ready to fuel up and drift your vehicle as fast as you can to reach safely. This cool 3D car racing game includes over 15 car models to use, dynamic physics and 3 unique maps with various ramps and platforms.
